name: Citricide classic
description:
Simple "Demo" for a project of mine.

Run, Jump, and Die your way through a handful of levels in this platformer based around Citrus Fruits!

currently there are only a handful of levels and mechanics, but we are looking at adding a ton more stuff as time goes on!

controls are keyboard(arrow keys/shift/Z/X) or gamepad(xbox360/xbox1)

feel free to send me feedback on twitter at @gr8g0rys!
